title: Duel
desc:
Post 80
- Choose a player. One of their Properties, at random, willbe forced into a Closed Auction between them and yourself, with the Property's Buy Price as the starting bid.
- If you bid higher than its owner, you steal the Property and everything built on it.
- If the owner out-bids you, or if neither bids at all, the owner keeps the Property.
- In either case, money is paid to the Bank, even if the owner is re-purchasing what they already owned.
